statements: SELECT * FROM HealthcareData WHERE age > 30
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM HealthcareData WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, prescription FROM HealthcareData WHERE diagnosis='Fever' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM HealthcareData WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender, prescription FROM HealthcareData WHERE age < 25
SELECT * FROM HealthcareData WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM HealthcareData WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, prescription FROM HealthcareData WHERE diagnosis IN ('Flu', 'COVID-19') ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, prescription FROM HealthcareData WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM HealthcareData WHERE gender = 'Male' AND prescription IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiologist';
SELECT id, name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, address FROM patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, phone_number FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Pediatrician' AND id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT name, specialization, phone_number FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC
SELECT id, name, address, contact_number FROM patients WHERE age < 18
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Doctors WHERE experience_years >= 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, location FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.treatment_plan LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Doctors ORDER BY experience_years DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name, MedicalRecords.admission_date, MedicalRecords.discharge_date FROM MedicalRecords JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON MedicalRecords.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_info;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_experience FROM doctor_info;
SELECT hospital_name, hospital_location, hospital_capacity FROM hospital_info;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM patient_info;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_info WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM doctor_info WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctor_info ORDER BY doctor_experience DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM Appointments WHERE doctor_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM Appointments GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors WHERE availability=true ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors WHERE availability=true ORDER BY name;
SELECT appointment_id, Appointments.patient_id, Appointments.doctor_id, Doctors.name, Appointments.appointment_date FROM Appointments JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT Medications.medication_id, Medications.name, Medications.description, Diagnostics.result FROM Medications LEFT JOIN Diagnostics ON Medications.medication_id = Diagnostics.diagnostic_id;
